title: [CRASH] Redis 5.0.7 crashed by signal: 11
body:
**Crash report**

Paste the complete crash log between the quotes below. Please include a few lines from the log preceding the crash report to provide some context.

```
=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===
16502:M 27 Oct 2021 11:27:21.662 # Redis 5.0.7 crashed by signal: 11
16502:M 27 Oct 2021 11:27:21.662 # Crashed running the instruction at: 0x7fff20432440
16502:M 27 Oct 2021 11:27:21.662 # Accessing address: 0x3051b3000
16502:M 27 Oct 2021 11:27:21.662 # Failed assertion: <no assertion failed> (<no file>:0)

3   ???                                 0x0000000108fa3c00 0x0 + 4445584384
```

1. OS distribution and version
> macOS 11.5.1
2. Steps to reproduce (if any)
> Crashed when attempting to start the server. src/redis-server

comments_data.body:
this is a duplicate of #8062
resolved by #8088 and #8150
Please upgrade to 5.0.11 or greater
